title: Invalid number of parameters for "undefined". Got 3 expected 5!

body:
Even when deploying on `JS VM - London` in remix I only use three parameters in the constructor: 

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/30902582/160275613-f4d5ad5b-24ef-4259-9980-cefbfbc08dba.png)
One more question for this issue: Is there a way to completely reset `ganache` and `truffle` without creating a new project? Like to clear all contracts and trx?

Is your project on GitHub somewhere that we can take a look? It's hard to help troubleshoot with just pasted contracts :)

If you wan to clear out your compiled contracts you can delete the `build` folder - and for Ganache you can just restart it. Is that what you are looking for?

@marcpre It looks to me like the problem is that you're using `artifacts.require` incorrectly.  The argument to `artifacts.require` should be the name of the contract, not the file the contract is defined in.  So `const rNFT = artifacts.require("rNFTs")`.
Closing this for issue maintenance.  @marcpre, let us know if there's still a problem and if so we can perhaps reopen this.
